detailed_summary:
**Summary of Financial Statements for Ellah Lakes PLC for the Year Ended July 31, 2013**

**Statement of Financial Position:**
- **Total Assets:** N1,177,844,440 (2013) vs. N1,129,956,972 (2012)
  - **Non-Current Assets:** N1,140,158,540 (2013) vs. N1,119,767,991 (2012)
    - **Property, Plant & Equipment:** N1,091,372,975 (2013) vs. N1,071,934,596 (2012)
    - **Biological Assets:** N37,685,900 (2013) vs. N10,188,981 (2012)
  - **Current Assets:** N37,685,900 (2013) vs. N10,188,981 (2012)
    - **Cash & Cash Equivalents:** N2,390,606 (2013) vs. N4,698,687 (2012)
- **Total Liabilities:** N592,061,894 (2013) vs. N616,922,887 (2012)
  - **Current Liabilities:** N178,725,899 (2013) vs. N153,864,906 (2012)
- **Members' Funds/Equity:** N585,782,546 (2013) vs. N510,534,085 (2012)
  - **Share Capital:** N60,000,000 (2013) vs. N60,000,000 (2012)
  - **Retained Earnings/(Loss):** N(30,337,852) (2013) vs. N(6,379,788) (2012)

**Statement of Comprehensive Income:**
- **Sales Revenue:** N11,626,581 (2013) vs. N4,848,870 (2012)
- **Cost of Sales:** N9,457,674 (2013) vs. N5,023,880 (2012)
- **Gross Profit:** N2,168,907 (2013) vs. N(175,010) (2012)
- **Operating/Overhead Expenses:** N24,860,992 (2013) vs. N31,231,523 (2012)
- **Profit/(Loss) Before Taxation:** N(30,337,852) (2013) vs. N(6,379,788) (2012)
- **Net Profit/(Loss):** N(42,218,690) (2013) vs. N(47,756,085) (2012)

**Statement of Cash Flow:**
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents at Beginning of Period:** N4,698,687 (2013) vs. N1,020,890 (2012)
- **Net Cash Inflow from Operating Activities:** N(30,337,852) (2013)
- **Net Cash Outflow from Investment Activities:** N(2,308,081) (2013)
- **Cash and Cash Equivalents at End of Period:** N2,390,606 (2013) vs. N4,698,687 (2012)

This summary encapsulates the key financial figures and changes for Ellah Lakes PLC, highlighting significant trends in assets, liabilities, equity, revenue, expenses, and cash flow for the fiscal year ending July 31, 2013.
